updateResetTokenByEmail: UPDATE userTbl SET passwordResetToken = ? WHERE email = ?
selectTokenByUid: SELECT passwordResetToken FROM userTbl WHERE uid = ?
setNewPasswordByUid: UPDATE userTbl SET password = ?, passwordResetToken = NULL WHERE uid = ?
selectSavesByUidAndSaveId: SELECT * FROM savedata WHERE saveId = ? AND userId = ?
updateSaveFile: UPDATE savedata, jobsTbl, statsTbl SET ?, jobsTbl.encryptedJobs = ?, statsTbl.completedJobs = ?, statsTbl.fastestCompletion = ?, statsTbl.totalIncome = ? WHERE savedata.saveId = ? AND savedata.userId = ? AND jobsTbl.saveId = (SELECT id FROM savedata WHERE saveId = ?) AND jobsTbl.userId = ? AND statsTbl.userId = ?
overrideSaveFile: UPDATE savedata, jobsTbl SET lvl=0,xp=0,money=0,time=0,cpuId=0,gpuId=0,ramId=0,stgId=0,lastBought='{"cpu":0,"gpu":0,"ram":0,"stg":0}', jobsTbl.encryptedJobs = '#-#-#-#' WHERE savedata.userId = ? AND savedata.saveId = ? AND jobsTbl.saveId = (SELECT id FROM savedata WHERE saveId = ?) AND jobsTbl.userId = ?
selectAllSavesForGame: SELECT savedata.saveId, lvl, xp, time, money, cpuId, gpuId, ramId, stgId, lastBought, jobsTbl.encryptedJobs FROM jobsTbl INNER JOIN savedata ON jobsTbl.saveId = savedata.id WHERE savedata.userId = ? ORDER BY lastModified DESC
deleteSaveFile: DELETE FROM savedata WHERE userId = ? AND saveId = ?
checkIfIsAdmin: SELECT isAdmin FROM userTbl WHERE uid = ?
selectTableNamesAndColumns: SELECT TABLE_NAME, COLUMN_NAME, COLUMN_TYPE FROM information_schema.COLUMNS WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA = ? AND TABLE_NAME <> ? AND TABLE_NAME <> ?
